panels.description: Volumes Protected With Snapmirror (Local And Remote)

targets.expr: count(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",protectedBy=~"snapmirror.*|consistency_group.*|cg_and_snapmirror.*",protectionRole="protected", snapshot_policy!=""})
count(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",protectedBy="storage_vm_dr",protectionRole="protected",snapshot_policy!=""})
count(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",protectedBy="svmdr_and_snapmirror",protectionRole="protected",snapshot_policy!=""})
count(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",protectionRole="unprotected",snapshot_policy!=""})

panels.title: Protected By Status

targets.expr: count(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",protectedBy=~"snapmirror.*|consistency_group.*|cg_and_snapmirror.*",protectionRole="protected",snapshot_policy!=""})
count(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",protectedBy=~"svmdr_and_snapmirror",protectionRole="protected",snapshot_policy!=""})

count(group by (source_volume) (1 < snapmirror_lag_time{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster", source_volume!=""} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)")  <= 900))

count(group by (source_volume) (900 < snapmirror_lag_time{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster", source_volume!=""} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)")  <= 1800))

count(group by (source_volume) (1800 < snapmirror_lag_time{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster", source_volume!=""} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)")  <= 3600))

count(group by (source_volume) (snapmirror_lag_time{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",source_volume!=""} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)") > 3600))

count(group by (source_volume) (1 < snapmirror_lag_time{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster", source_volume!=""} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)")  <= 900))

count(group by (source_volume) (900 < snapmirror_lag_time{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster", source_volume!=""} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)")  <= 1800))
count(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",protectedBy=~"storage_vm_dr",protectionRole="protected",snapshot_policy!=""})
count(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",protectionRole="unprotected",snapshot_policy!=""})

count(group by (source_volume) (1800 < snapmirror_lag_time{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster", source_volume!=""} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)")  <= 3600))

count(group by (source_volume) (snapmirror_lag_time{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",source_volume!=""} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)") > 3600))
volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*", protectionRole != "destination",snapshot_policy!=""}

panels.title: SnapMirror Volumes (local and remote) Protected by

targets.expr: snapmirror_lag_time{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",source_volume!=""} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)")

count(snapmirror_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*", derived_relationship_type="extended_data_protection"} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)") )

count(snapmirror_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*", derived_relationship_type="mirror_vault"} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)") )

count(snapmirror_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*", derived_relationship_type="vault"} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)") )

count(snapmirror_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*", derived_relationship_type="sync_mirror_strict"} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)") )

count(snapmirror_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*", derived_relationship_type="sync_mirror"} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)") )

count(snapmirror_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*", derived_relationship_type="extended_data_protection"} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)") )

count(snapmirror_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*", derived_relationship_type="mirror_vault"} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)") )

count(snapmirror_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*", derived_relationship_type="vault"} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)") )
count(group by (volume)(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster", volume!~"MDV.*", all_sm_healthy="true"}))
count(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*", all_sm_healthy="false"})
count(group by (volume)(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster", volume!~"MDV.*", all_sm_healthy="true"}))

count(snapmirror_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*", derived_relationship_type="sync_mirror_strict"} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)") )

count(snapmirror_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*", derived_relationship_type="sync_mirror"} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)") )
count(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*", all_sm_healthy="false"})

snapmirror_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*"} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)")

snapmirror_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*"} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw",all_sm_healthy != ""}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)")
